import * as vendorTool from '../tools/vendor

const useTemplateState = () => {
  const store: Context = vendorTool.react.useContext(context)

  // ------------------------------------------------------------ Get --

  // ------------------------------------------------------------ Set --

  // ------------------------------------------------------------ Store --

  // ------------------------------------------------------------ Remove --

  // ------------------------------------------------------------ Fetch --

  // ------------------------------------------------------------ Create --

  // ------------------------------------------------------------ Update --

  // ------------------------------------------------------------ Delete --

  // ------------------------------------------------------------ export --
